condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var key;
key=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM JGCRM.LBORGANIZATION WHERE ID =? CONNECT BY PRIOR ID = FID START WITH ID = 13831",[$Login.User.OrgID]);
key>0

function.name: lb.Assert
function.arg: '请按照公司涉军项目管理要求，履行线下审批程序!'

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var  yjbmid = ABS_SQLVALUE("select id  from jgcrm.lborganization where fid = 1 start with id= ? connect by prior fid = id",[O_WORKFLOW.SQBM]);
var  cnt2 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from jgcrm.lborganization where id = ? and sfdlbm =1",[yjbmid]);
cnt2 > 0

function.name: abs.ExecSQL
function.arg: ["call ecif.PRO_IB_SENDWFNOTIFY(?,?,{0},{1},2,{2})",[{"expression":"O_WORKFLOW.InstID","scale":"","length":"","type":"1"},{"expression":"<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>\r\nABS_SQLVALUE(\"select id from jgcrm.tuser where id = 1279\")","scale":"","length":"","type":"0"},{"expression":"'-协议终止流程已提交质控部文管提交OA'","scale":"","length":"","type":"0"}]]

step.name: 项目组部门总经理审核

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var  yjbmid = ABS_SQLVALUE("select id  from jgcrm.lborganization where fid = 1 start with id= ? connect by prior fid = id",[O_WORKFLOW.SQR.OrgID]);
var  cnt2 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from jgcrm.lborganization where id = ? and sfdlbm =1",[yjbmid]);
cnt2 > 0

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var a=ABS_LOADBEAN("com.apex.bss.mod.gdzqWorkflowWebservice.workflowSamples.InternalDocumentsJavabean");
var oaid=a.creatNewWorkFlow("lcIB_ZZXYSPLC",O_WORKFLOW.ID,O_WORKFLOW.XMMC.ID,$Login.User,'100000');
var ret = LB_sqlProcedure("{call ecif.pro_ib_oaresulthandle(:ral{int},:ret,?,?,?,?)}",[oaid,O_WORKFLOW.ID,"lcIB_ZZXYSPLC",$Login.User]); 
ABS_SETRETNOTE(ret.get('ret'));
if(ret.get('ral')>0){
	true;
}else{
	false;
}

function.name: lb.Assert
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var status=ABS_SQLVALUE("select max(status) from ecif.tib_oawfhandle where upper(lcbd)=upper('lcib_zzxysplc') and lcbdid=?",[O_WORKFLOW.ID]);
status==1

cnt2 > 0

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var s=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM JGCRM.OS_CURRENTSTEP T,JGCRM.LBWFCURRENTOWNER A WHERE T.ID = A.STEPID AND T.ENTRY_ID = ? AND T.STEP_ID = 137 AND A.OWNER = ?",[O_WORKFLOW.InstID,$Login.User]);
if (s>0){
LB_workAction("lcIB_ZZXYSPLC",O_WORKFLOW.ID,138,"");
ABS_flushObjCache('WORKFLOW.TASK')
}

function.name: abs.ExecSQL

<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var xmid =O_WORKFLOW.XMMC;
var result=null;
var bean = ABS_LOADBEAN("com.apex.bss.mod.ibb.systemdocking.papers.LinkstecBean");
result = bean.execute(1007, $Login.User.UserID, 1,xmid);
var note=result.get('note');
var code=result.get('code');
true;
